casebody.data:
RAY H. ADAMS, ALFRED D. ADAMS, et al., as Executors of the Last Will and Testament of Joseph H. Adams, Deceased, v. THE HACKENSACK TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee for Henry P. Stoney. 22 So. (2nd) 396

January Term, 1945

May 29, 1945 Division A Walsh & Ellis and Alfred E. Sapp, for appellants. G. C. Youmans, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

This is a companion case to that other case of Ray H. Adams, Alfred D. Adams, Alvah E. Davison and Charles W. Beeching, as Executors of the Last Will and Testament of Joseph E. Adams, deceased, appellants, v. The Hackensack Trust Company, as Trustee for Anna E. Ely, appellee, decided this date.

The decree is affirmed on authority of the opinion and judgement in that case.

So ordered.

CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BUFQRD and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
